Description: UNPLAYED! Gibson Custom Shop Les Paul Special '60 1960 Reissue 2018 Candy Blue Lovies Guitars is offering up a gorgeous and unplayed Gibson Custom Shop Les Paul ’60 Special! In a gorgeous color Candy Blue! This is a gorgeous guitar! The P90’s sound absolutely incredible as well! This is essentially a brand new guitar at a heavily discounted price! It has been untouched from the factory! See many detailed images included!
